attributes.action: stop giving aid to ther countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As far as I am concerned aid is charity and should be voluntary, by giving this countries money to others in aid and subsidies is forcing us to be charitable.
If I wish to be charitable I will give to a charity.
If the government wishes to be charitable they dip into the tax coffers and give it out.
I dont remember being asked if I mind giving out any of my tax money to people outside the U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
